controller

Class MouseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MouseController

  • public class MouseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller of the Mouse events, every action on the mouse is registered, and Handled here. The MouseController is initialized in the MainController.
    Author:
    Ali Arfan, Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen, Stian Tornholm Grimsgaard

      • MouseController

        public MouseController(GameBoard board)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        MouseController 
         public MouseController(GameBoard board)

        Creates an instance of the MouseController attached to a GameBoard object

        Parameters:
        board - - the GameBoard object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - - Throws an exception if no GameBoard object is null reference.

    • Method Detail

      • getBoardValues

        private void getBoardValues()
        getBoardValues 
        private void getBoardValues()

        Gets the offsets for the top-left corner. The offsets are the distance between the board and the canvas. There values are pulled from the GameBoard object.

      • mouseMap

        private void mouseMap(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
        mouseMap 
        private mouseMap(MouseEvent me)

        Internal method for handling which cell on the GameBoard object was clicked.

        Parameters:
        me - - MouseEvent to be delivered.

      • scrollZoom

        public void scrollZoom(javafx.scene.input.ScrollEvent se,
                       double minValue,
                       double maxValue)
        scrollZoom 
        public scrollZoom(ScrollEvent se)

        Receives an scroll event and handles the offsets accordingly on the GameBoard object for the zoom to be performed correctly.

        Values outside the minValue and maxValue are ignored.

        Parameters:
        se - - ScrollEvent sending the produced gesture.
        minValue - - min value this method will allow.
        maxValue - - max value this method will allow.

      • mouseMoved

        public void mouseMoved(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
        mouseMoved 
        public mouseMoved(MouseEvent me)

        Registers mouse movement.

        Parameters:
        me - - the mouse event that will be used to capture the movement.

      • mouseButtonReleased

        public void mouseButtonReleased(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
        mouseButtonReleased 
        public mouseButtonRelased(MouseEvent me)

        Receives an MouseEvent when the mouse button is released, and stops drawing cells.

        Parameters:
        me - - The mouseEvent of when the left mouse button is released.

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
        mouseDragged 
        public mouseDragged(MouseEvent me)

        Receives an MouseEvent when the right mouse button is clicked down, and dragged.

        Parameters:
        me - - The mouseEvent of when the right mouse button is clicked and the mouse is dragged.
